TitlePage.Title: &gpd;
TitlePage.Subtitle: Groupoids, graphs of groups, and graphs of groupoids
TitlePage.Author: Emma Moore

Chris Wensley c.d.wensley@bangor.ac.uk http://www.bangor.ac.uk/~mas023/
School of Computer Science, Bangor University,
Dean Street, Bangor, Gwynedd, LL57 1UT, U.K.
TitlePage.Abstract:
The &gpd; package for &GAP;4 provides functions for the computation with groupoids (categories with every arrow invertible) and their morphisms; for graphs of groups, and graphs of groupoids.
It provides normal forms for Free Products with Amalgamation and for HNN-extensions when the initial groups have rewrite systems and the subgroups have finite index.
The &gpd; package was originally implemented in 2000 (as GraphGpd) when the first author was studying for a Ph.D. in Bangor.
Version 1.07 was released in July 2011, to be tested with &GAP; 4.5. Version 1.15 came out with the first release of &GAP; 4.5 in June 2012. The aim is that this version should be submitted for official acceptance as a &GAP; package. The latest version is &VERSION; of January 25th 2013, prepared for &GAP; 4.6.
The package now includes the more basic structure of magma with objects. It has been released to coincide with the publication of . This version does not implement all the constructions introduced in the paper, so a new version will be released as soon as possible.
Bug reports, suggestions and comments are, of course, welcome. Please contact the second author at c.d.wensley@bangor.ac.uk.
